summary.span: 宣告即使堆疊中較高層的呼叫端未獲得資源存取權限，呼叫程式碼仍可透過呼叫這個方法的程式碼要求權限，來存取受保護的資源。

span.span: Declares that the calling code can access the resource protected by a permission demand through the code that calls this method, even if callers higher in the stack have not been granted permission to access the resource.

summary.span: 使用 會造成安全性弱點。

span.span: Using can create security vulnerabilities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是唯一的方式來判斷多個權限提示在相同的時間範圍內，因為只有一個作用中的框架。This is the only way to assert multiple permissions at the same time within a frame because only one can be active on a frame. 僅適用於授與權限。 is only effective for granted permissions. 呼叫或是方法來取消作用。Call the or method to cancel an active . > [!CAUTION] > 因為呼叫方法會移除所有程式碼呼叫鏈結中的需求必須被授與權限來存取指定的資源，如果不正確或不當使用，它可以開啟啟動安全性弱點。Because calling the method removes the requirement that all code in the call chain must be granted permission to access the specified resource, it can open up security vulnerabilities if used incorrectly or inappropriately. 因此，它應該使用小心謹慎。Therefore, it should be used with great caution.

exception.span: 已判斷提示的 執行個體未獲得判斷提示程式碼。

span.span: The instance asserted has not been granted to the asserting code.
-or-

exception.span: 目前的框架已有作用中的 。

span.span: There is already an active for the current frame.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Demand() cil managed
abstract member Demand : unit -> unit override this.Demand : unit -> unit

summary.span: 如果在呼叫堆疊中較高的所有呼叫端都尚未被授與由目前執行個體所指定之權限，則會在執行階段強制執行 。

span.span: Forces a at run time if all callers higher in the call stack have not been granted the permissions specified by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用上以確保所有呼叫端具有所有使用權限，一項作業集合中。Use on a to ensure that all callers have all permissions in the set with one operation. 呼叫這個方法的程式碼的權限就不會檢查;檢查立即呼叫端程式碼從開始，並繼續向上堆疊。The permissions of the code that calls this method are not examined; the check begins from the immediate caller of that code and proceeds up the stack. 通常，向下成長，來表示呼叫堆疊，使方法呼叫堆疊中較高層呼叫方法較低的呼叫堆疊中。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack. 只有當沒有成功就會擲回。 succeeds only if no is thrown. 如果包含不是繼承自的權限，則`Demand`也會呼叫這些權限的方法。If the contains permissions that do not inherit from , the `Demand` methods of those permissions are called as well. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法來要求權限集合中的所有權限。The following code example shows the use of the method to demand all the permissions in a permission set. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.PermissionSet#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/CPP/permissionset.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.PermissionSet#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/CS/permissionset.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.PermissionSet#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/VB/permissionset.vb#4)]

exception.span: 呼叫鏈結中的呼叫端沒有要求的權限。

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have the permission demanded.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Deny() cil managed
abstract member Deny : unit -> unit override this.Deny : unit -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Deny is obsolete and will be removed in a future release of the .NET Framework. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=155570 for more information.")

summary.span: 會讓任何通過權限呼叫程式碼的 失敗，該權限與目前 中包含的權限類型有交集。

span.span: Causes any that passes through the calling code for a permission that has an intersection with a permission of a type contained in the current to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可防止呼叫堆疊中較高層的呼叫端程式碼呼叫此方法中，透過存取受保護的資源，即使這些呼叫端必須被授與存取權限。This method prevents callers higher in the call stack from accessing the protected resource through the code that calls this method, even if those callers have been granted permission to access it. 通常，向下成長，來表示呼叫堆疊，使方法呼叫堆疊中較高層呼叫方法較低的呼叫堆疊中。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack. 可以限制程式設計師的責任或協助避免意外安全性漏洞，因有利於防止呼叫從用來存取所拒絕的權限保護的資源。 can limit the liability of the programmer or help prevent accidental security vulnerabilities because it helps prevent the method that calls from being used to access the resource protected by the denied permission. 如果方法呼叫權限，而且如果的呼叫堆疊中較低的呼叫端叫用該權限時，該安全性檢查失敗時達到。If a method calls on a permission, and if a for that permission is invoked by a caller lower in the call stack, that security check fails when it reaches the . 會忽略該權限的要求不成功，因為未授與的權限。 is ignored for a permission that is not granted because a demand for that permission cannot succeed.

exception.span: 先前呼叫 已限制目前堆疊框架的權限。

span.span: A previous call to has already restricted the permissions for the current stack frame.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.PermissionSet Intersect(class System.Security.PermissionSet other) cil managed
Public Function Intersect (other As PermissionSet) As PermissionSet

param.name: other
param.span: 要與目前 產生交集的權限集。

span.span: A permission set to intersect with the current .

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前 與指定 交集的權限集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission set that is the intersection of the current and the specified .

returns.span: 新的權限集，代表目前 和指定目標的交集。

span.span: A new permission set that represents the intersection of the current and the specified target.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，這個物件就是 。

span.span: This object is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限集合的交集會說明兩者所共同描述的作業集合的權限集合。The intersection of two permission sets is a permission set that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 具體來說，它代表的最小權限，任何通過這兩個權限的需求設定也傳遞它們的交集。Specifically, it represents the minimum permissions such that any demand that passes both permission sets also passes their intersection. 每一種是出現在兩個集合的權限，兩個執行個體，這些權限會交集使用的權限`Intersect`方法，產生的權限會包含在產生。For each type of permission that is present in both sets, the two instances of those permissions are intersected using the permission's `Intersect` method; the resulting permission is included in the resulting . 只有其中兩個集合中存在的權限類型會排除結果集。Permission types that exist in only one of the two sets are excluded from the resulting set. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.PermissionSet#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/CPP/permissionset.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.PermissionSet#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/CS/permissionset.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Security.PermissionSet#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/VB/permissionset.vb#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以為空白，且尚未包含的權限的執行個體，如果這些權限是在完全受限制的狀態。A can be empty and yet contain instances of permissions if those permissions are in the fully-restricted state. 權限都是完全限制狀態如果他們`IsSubsetOf`方法會傳回`true`當`null`做為參數傳遞。Permissions are in a fully restricted state if their `IsSubsetOf` methods return `true` when `null` is passed as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A為目標的子集如果所有要求，都成功的也目標都成功。A is a subset of the target if all demands that succeed for the also succeed for the target. 也就是目標至少包含在子集中所包含的權限。That is, the target contains at least the permissions contained in the subset. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PermitOnly() cil managed
abstract member PermitOnly : unit -> unit override this.PermitOnly : unit -> unit

summary.span: 會讓透過非目前 子集的任何 呼叫程式碼傳遞之任何 失敗。

span.span: Causes any that passes through the calling code for any that is not a subset of the current to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類似於，兩者會導致堆疊查核行程，它們本來可以成功時失敗。 is similar to , in that both cause stack walks to fail when they would otherwise succeed. 其差異在於指定將會導致失敗，堆疊查核行程的權限，但指定唯一的權限不會造成失敗的堆疊查核行程。The difference is that specifies permissions that will cause the stack walk to fail, but specifies the only permissions that do not cause the stack walk to fail. 呼叫此方法，以確保您的程式碼，可用來存取指定的資源。Call this method to ensure that your code can be used to access only the specified resources. 會忽略該權限的要求不成功，因為未授與權限。 is ignored for a permission not granted because a demand for that permission cannot succeed. 不過，如果程式碼呼叫較低堆疊稍後呼叫該權限，請堆疊查核行程達到嘗試呼叫的程式碼時，會擲回。However, if code lower on the call stack later calls for that permission, a is thrown when the stack walk reaches the code that tried to call . 這是因為程式碼，呼叫沒有被授予權限，即使它呼叫該使用權限。This is because the code that called has not been granted the permission, even though it called for that permission. 通常，向下成長，來表示呼叫堆疊，使方法呼叫堆疊中較高層呼叫方法較低的呼叫堆疊中。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.IPermission RemovePermission(class System.Type permClass) cil managed
Public Function RemovePermission (permClass As Type) As IPermission

param.name: permClass
param.span: 要刪除之權限的類型。

span.span: The type of permission to delete.

summary.span: 從集合中移除特定類型的權限。

span.span: Removes a permission of a certain type from the set.

returns.span: 從集合中移除的權限。

span.span: The permission removed from the set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 您無法移除權限不受限制的權限集合。You cannot remove permissions from an unrestricted permission set. 權限集合會保持不受限制的後您嘗試移除此權限，而且不會擲回例外狀況。The permission set remains unrestricted after you attempt to remove the permission, and an exception is not thrown. 下列 C# 程式碼會嘗試移除從`FullTrust`設定權限，但不是會移除權限。The following C# code attempts to remove the from the `FullTrust` permission set, but the permission is not removed. ``` PolicyLevel myPol = PolicyLevel.CreateAppDomainLevel(); PermissionSet myPermSet = myPol.GetNamedPermissionSet("FullTrust"); myPermSet.RemovePermission(typeof(FileIOPermission)); ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法來移除從權限集。The following code example shows the use of the method to remove a from a permission set. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是表示由目前的所有作業指定所代表的所有作業以及。The result of a call to is a that represents all the operations represented by the current as well as all the operations represented by the specified . 如果設定為`Unrestricted`，等位是`Unrestricted`以及。If either set is `Unrestricted`, the union is `Unrestricted` as well. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
